moduleMeta.name: riverInitialInput
moduleMeta.author: longyinping11@lzb.ac.cn
moduleMeta.description: reading or generating the initial condition of the model, i.e. depth of river water, lateral inflow at last time step and discharge of each flow interval at last time step

var.name: intervalFlowInputPath
var.description: the file where discharge of each flow interval at last time step is saved

var.name: b
var.description: river width of each flow interval (m)

var.name: roughness
var.description: Manning's roughness of each flow interval (m)

var.name: s0
var.description: river bed slope of each flow interval(ND)

var.name: nflow
var.description: number of flow intervals of each subbasin

var.name: qlin1_river
var.description: lateral inflow of each flow interval at last time step (m^3/s)

var.name: q1_river
var.description: discharge of each flow interval at last time step (m^3/s)

var.name: Drw_river
var.description: water depth of each flow interval
